turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey can order me 2 pizzas online from Lou Malnati's

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Lou Malnati's on Lincoln?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah the one by that ice cream shop.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to order for delivery or pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Delivery would be great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of pizza would you life for me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the first pizza can you order me a Deep Dish Malnati Chicago Classic.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like for the Deep Dish?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large would be fine for that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any addition toppings for that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, nothing addition for that one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like for the second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get a Thin Crust Pepperoni?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that large also?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, can I actually get that in Extra Large. I got a big group coming.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any extra toppings for that one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually can you add green pepper for half of the pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So half pepperoni and half pepperoni & green pepper?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like me to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ummmm Can I get a 2 liter of Coke and Sprite.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else like breadsticks or pasta?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that would be all thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll put in the order right now should take about 1.5 hr to 2hr because of the deep dish and delivery.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok sounds great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
